test-case.name: tryToFinishAnUpdateProcessAfterItHasBeenFinished
test-case.description: Controller trys to finish an update process after it has been finished by an error action status.

test-case.name: rootRsIpAddressNotStoredIfDisabled
test-case.description: Ensures that the source IP address of the polling target is not stored in repository if disabled

test-case.name: testActionHistoryNegativeInput
test-case.description: Test to verify that entire action history is returned if the input value for actionHistory is -1, for getControllerDeploymentActionFeedback endpoint.

test-case.name: targetPollDoesNotModifyAuditData
test-case.description: Ensures that target poll request does not change audit data on the entity.

test-case.name: pollWithModifiedGloablPollingTime
test-case.description: Ensures that tenant specific polling time, which is saved in the db, is delivered to the controller.

test-case.name: targetCannotBeRegisteredIfTenantDoesNotExistsButWhenExists
test-case.description: Ensures that targets cannot be created e.g. in plug'n play scenarios when tenant does not exists but can be created if the tenant exists.

test-case.name: rootRsPlugAndPlayIpAddress
test-case.description: Ensures that the source IP address of the polling target is correctly stored in repository

test-case.name: rootRsWithoutId
test-case.description: Ensures that server returns a not found response in case of empty controlloer ID.

test-case.name: rootRsPrecommissioned
test-case.description: Ensures that the target state machine of a precomissioned target switches from UNKNOWN to REGISTERED when the target polls for the first time.

test-case.name: rootRsPlugAndPlay
test-case.description: Ensures that the system creates a new target in plug and play manner, i.e. target is authenticated but does not exist yet.

test-case.name: rootRsNotModified
test-case.description: Ensures that etag check results in not modified response if provided etag by client is identical to entity in repository.

test-case.name: testActionHistoryCount
test-case.description: Test to verify that only a specific count of messages are returned based on the input actionHistory for getControllerDeploymentActionFeedback endpoint.

test-case.name: testActionHistoryZeroInput
test-case.description: Test to verify that a zero input value of actionHistory results in no action history appended for getControllerDeploymentActionFeedback endpoint.

label.name: feature
label.value: Component Tests - Direct Device Integration API
